author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's here! The Third Edition of Warhammer: The Horus Heresy is up for pre-order today and I've got my hands on the new box to compare to the previous one. Let's ask and answer two big questions... How does this box stand up as a STARTER SET.... and as a PRODUCT?

Check out the Print Material Review HERE: https://youtu.be/BdWY6UcW1B0

Big thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the box to review. 

#adwip
#NewHeresy
#Saturnine
#WarhammerCommunity 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerr
title: GMG Reviews - Warhammer: The Horus Heresy - SATURNINE (Part One: The Boxed Set) by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Hey folks! Did you know it's been TEN YEARS since Frostgrave came out? You must because since that first Let's Play here on GMG I've aged worse than a sitting President. Let's dive in and check out Joe's final word on Spells in the Frozen city and explore the BIBLIOSEPULCHRE! 

Big thanks to Osprey for the Complimentary copy of the book to review. 

Music "Retrofuture Nasty" by Kevin McLeod used via Creative Commons
title: GMG Reviews - FROSTGRAVE - Advanced Spellcraft by Joe McCullough & Osprey Games
